sub_title_h3: We are the Grama Sevakha Niladhari division of Udapalatha GS wasama under the Kandy Division Secretariate.
form_body: You can now download all your necessary documents and forms online without having to go to GS office. Isn’t it time saving?
download_body: You can now download all your necessary documents and forms online without having to go to GS office. Isn’t it time saving?kjhgf
project_details: Take a look at the projects that are happening in your neighbourhood. There is so much that we can do as a community to help each other out for the welfare of everyone.

resource_details_body: In need of resource materials for your on-going projects or inventions? We are here to provide and facilitate your small scale businesses.
